descript.abstract: River and stream centerlines including intermittent streams depicted as linear features on USGS 7-5 minute quad maps
descript.purpose: state wide water resource inventory and mapping

procstep.procdesc: Linear hydrographic features were manually digitized from source maps with tablets USGS quad map names added as attributes
Updated Point of Contact information for this dataset from "RIGIS Coordinator" to "Paul Jordan."
